item.title: Exploratory Data Analysis Best Practices for Exhaustive Data Analysis
item.description: Introduction EDA, short for Exploratory Data Analysis, or as I like to call it, Data Reveal Party ðŸ˜Š (because it’s fun playing around and getting your hands dirty with datasets) is one of the most important steps towards a successful data project. You get to uncover hidden data insights that only this process can unearth. It is therefore good practice to make sure you exhaust on it by investigating and looking at the dataset from every possible angle.
